price: (8) And they give food in spite of love for it[1813] to the needy, the orphan, and the captive,
arabic: وَيُطۡعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسۡكِينٗا وَيَتِيمٗا وَأَسِيرًا
footnotes: [1813]- The meaning here may also be "out of love for Him," i.e., Allāh (subḥānahu wa taʿālā).

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wayuṭ'ʿimūna al-ṭaʿāma ʿalā ḥubbihi mis'kīnan wayatīman wa-asīran
